div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1863 Sutlej River, Punjab, India or Paki- (928) stan, before 1870 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: AR. Pot hoard Apollodotus II?: "several" AR Zoilus II?: "several" AR Dionysius: 4 dr. Disposition: unknown Cunningham, NC 1870, pp. 86-7
